t: When Toyota met e-commerce: Lean at Amazon
s: February 1, 2014 - Given the business evolution of Amazon from a bookstore to the store for everything, we had to reinvent automation, following the lean principle of “autonomation”: keep the humans for high-value, complex work and use machines to support those tasks. Humans are extremely creative and flexible.

t: How Amazon Uses Six Sigma and You Can Too
s: February 25, 2025 - The eCommerce giant comfortably sits atop all other online retailers, a status due in part to its widespread application of Six Sigma to all processes.
